content:
Exciting! It's always great to earn miles and get closer to redeeming a reward ticket.

To log in to your frequent flyer account, you'll need to go to the United Airlines website and click on the "Log in" button at the top right corner of the page. Then, enter your MileagePlus login credentials, which are usually your username and password.

Once you're logged in, you can click on "My Account" and then "Mileage Summary" to view your latest mileage activity. You should be able to see a record of your recent flight from LA to Chicago on February 15th, along with the miles you earned.

If you don't see the miles credited to your account, you can try checking the "Missing Miles" section or contacting United Airlines customer service to inquire about the status of your miles. They may need some additional information from you to verify the flight and credit the miles to your account.

Fingers crossed that your miles are there and you're one step closer to redeeming that reward ticket!
